means: [人名] [英格兰人姓氏] 布鲁克地貌名称，来源于古英语，含义是“小河”(brook)

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均有"江，河"之意。
means: brook ： 指小河，尤指发源于山泉的小河。
stream ： 泛指大小河流，也可专指小溪。

sentence.Network_en: Ahead, he saw the side railings of First Bridge over Crooked Brook.
sentence.Network_cn: 他看见了克鲁克德河上第一大桥的桥栏就在前面。

sentence.Network_en: The army will brook no weakening of its power.
sentence.Network_cn: 这支部队不会容忍对其实力的削弱。

sentence.Network_en: In our room we could hear the murmur of a distant brook.
sentence.Network_cn: 在我们房间能听到远处小溪汩汩的流水声.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English  brōc, of unknown origin; related to Dutch broek and German Bruch 'marsh'

Old English  brūcan 'use, possess', of Germanic origin; related to Dutch bruiken and German brauchen. The current sense dates from the mid 16th cent., a figurative use of an earlier sense 'digest, stomach'

encyclopedia.content: 2003年，斯坦福大学的Ian Buck等人对ANSI C进行扩展，开发了基于NVIDIA Cg的Brook源到源编译器。Brook可以将类似C的brook C语言通过brcc编译器编译为Cg代码，隐藏了利用图形学API实现的细节，大大简化了开发过程。但早期的Brook编译效率很低，并且只能使用像素着色器进行运算。受GPU架构限制，Brook也缺乏有效的数据通信机制。AMD/ATI公司在其GPGPU通用计算产品Stream中采用了Brook的改进版本Brook+作为高级开发语言。Brook+的编

entry.def: A brook is a small stream.

entry.tran: 容许，忍受（他人的干预或反对）
entry.def: If someone in a position of authority will brook no interference or opposition, they will not accept any interference or opposition from others.

example.ex: From childhood on, she'd had a plan of action, one that would brook no interference...
example.tran: 从孩提时代起，她就有了一个行动计划，而且是个不容他人干预的计划。

example.ex: The army will brook no weakening of its power.
example.tran: 这支部队不会容忍对其实力的削弱。

means.word_mean: 1. a natural stream of water smaller than a river (and often a tributary of a river);
1. put up with something or somebody unpleasant;

sentences.sentence: "The new secretary had to endure a lot of unprofessional remarks"
"She stuck out two years in a miserable marriage"

sentences.en: He would brook no interruptions from his listeners.
I could hear the sound of a babbling brook.
sentences.cn: 我听得见小溪潺潺的流水声。

jushi.english: He would brook no interruptions from his listeners.
At this point the waiter suggested it was time to go and would brook no disagreement.
jushi.chinese: 这时，侍者建议该离开了，不容有异议。

jushi.english: She won't brook any criticism of her work.
jushi.chinese: 她不接受任何对她工作的批评。
